articles.title: Red Lobster probes "endless shrimp" losses after bankruptcy filing - Reuters
articles.description: Red Lobster, which filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in Florida on Sunday night, is investigating the role its majority owner Thai Union played in the restaurant chain's "endless shrimp" promotion that caused $11 million in losses, court documents showed.
